title: ninnE nammitinayyA
sahitya:
ninnE nammitinayyA shrI rAma


anupallavi

  pannagEndra shayana pannagAri vAhana pannagAcala bhavya sadana praNatArti haraNa nipuNa


caraNam    parama krpAsAgara para tatvAdhAma varamlosaga brOvavayya vAsudEva
nIraja nEtra nibhagAtra girirAja sutAvara shankara sannuti pAtra sa caritra
